title: Still Really Hot
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... It’s already September, but it’s still this hot.... My magic is so strong that it messes up the seasons, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yoshiko-chan, your face is beet red, you know? Are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane. Of course it’s red, it’s so hot! What is with this heat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You said it was because of your magic.... Is it not?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-.... Well.... it is.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby can’t take this heat either~. Hey, how about we go buy some ice cream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Oh, that sounds great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then let’s go to Hanamaru-chan’s house. It has a lot of trees, and the breeze feels nice there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’ll go call her then. I’ll ask which ice cream she wants.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, ask her if she has some Noppo bread too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
